name: BladderCancerForUrologyCare
title: Bladder Cancer for Urology Care
description: (Clinical Focus: Bladder cancer as defined to areas of bladder for urology care),(Data Element Scope: This data element describes codes for bladder cancer based on area.),(Inclusion Criteria: Any bladder cancer diagnosed in the included areas),(Exclusion Criteria: Cancer elsewhere in urinary tract)
